name: Chart Maker
description:
Chart Maker is a chart plugin based on Nivo. In addition to the chart components from Nivo, Chart maker comes with an easy-to-learn configuration GUI that allows you to change parameters and generate mock data. This plugin is in development and we welcome your feedback via comments or email. Many thanks!


*The English version of Chart Maker is on the way.


Chart Maker 是一个基于 Nivo 的 Figma 图表配置插件。在 Nivo 图表组件的基础之上，Chart Maker 提供了可调整图表属性以及生成模拟数据的图形界面。此插件仍在开发当中，欢迎通过评论或邮箱给我们提供反馈。


Nivo: https://nivo.rocks

My email address: c.chen.ed5557@gmail.com
